Failed at: http://download.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/drops4/N20140626-2000/testresults/html/org.eclipse.jdt.core.tests.model_win32.win32.x86_7.0.html
http://download.eclipse.org/eclipse/downloads/drops4/N20140627-2000/testresults/html/org.eclipse.jdt.core.tests.model_win32.win32.x86_7.0.html
as well on both the platforms.
Jay, can you take a quick look - as per the history this test has been commented out by your commit sometime back.
Enabling was not intentional as it was an oversight when individual test additions were replaced by the general setupSuite. Would disable the test.

The test is a regression test for bug 39877, and the implementation looks valid to me. It would be good to know why the test fails. It is green locally, even when I add an explicit preferences.setAutoBuilding(...); with false or true.
Commenting it out for now is OK, but we should keep a bug open.

(In reply to Markus Keller from comment #5)
> Commenting it out for now is OK, but we should keep a bug open.
See Bug 378787
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 378787 ***
